excerpt: "Amazon last year unveiled a new mobile drive unit, dubbed Proteus, that the company describes as its first fully autonomous robot designed to operate safely alongside humans on the warehouse floor. Other new robots in the works promise to further reduce the risk of injury from repetitive motion."
